p: The EAEC strain 55989 agg3 − expressing AAF/IV displayed a variation in its adherence pattern. Especially noticeable in less densely occupied areas of the eukaryotic cells the bacteria formed a serpentine line pattern, which occasionally branched off or less frequently run parallel to one another. Overall, EAEC strain 55989 agg3 − expressing AAF/IV formed stacked-brick like patterns only when higher local concentrations of bacteria had been reached.
